import React,{useState}from'react';import{useParams,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ResetPassword=()=>{const{token}=useParams();const navigate=useNavigate();const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[confirm,setConfirm]=useState('');const[message,setMessage]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState('');const handleReset=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setMessage('');setError('');if(password!==confirm){setError('‚ùó Passwords do not match');return;}try{const response=await axios.post(`https://user-lookup-app.onrender.com/reset-password/${token}`,{password});setMessage(response.data.message||'‚úÖ Password reset!');setTimeout(()=>navigate('/login'),2000);}catch(err){var _err$response,_err$response$data;setError(((_err$response=err.response)===null||_err$response===void 0?void 0:(_err$response$data=_err$response.data)===null||_err$response$data===void 0?void 0:_err$response$data.error)||'‚ùå Reset failed');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"\uD83D\uDD12 Reset Password"}),message&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"success",children:message}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"error",children:error}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleReset,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"New Password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Confirm New Password",value:confirm,onChange:e=>setConfirm(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn-primary",type:"submit",children:"Reset Password"})]})]});};export default ResetPassword;
